title: Italy Private Debt to GDP
description: Private Debt to GDP in Italy decreased to 166.20 percent in 2021 from 174.20 percent in 2020. Private Debt to GDP in Italy averaged 156.63 percent from 1995 until 2021, reaching an all time high of 188.30 percent in 2012 and a record low of 119.70 percent in 1998. Private sector debt to GDP measures the indebtedness of both sectors, non-financial corporations and households and non-profit institutions serving households, as a percentage of GDP.
author: OECD
